mapper.insert: INSERT INTO expoverse.exhibition_visit (loginid, userid, trigger_timestamp, exhibition_id, enter) VALUES (#{loginid}, #{userid}, #{trigger_timestamp}, #{exhibition_id}, #{enter})
INSERT INTO expoverse.product_visit (loginid, userid, prodid, duration, trigger_timestamp) VALUES (#{loginid}, #{userid}, #{prodid}, #{duration}, #{trigger_timestamp})
